tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_field_mapping (
    field_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(100),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE FieldMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT NOT NULL,
    crop_id INT NOT NULL,
    mapping_date DATE NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES CropFields(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crops(crop_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FieldWorkers (
    worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    worker_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    field_id INT NOT NULL,
    designation VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES CropFields(id)
);

CREATE TABLE field_mapping (
  mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT,
  mapping_date DATE,
  mapping_data JSONB,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES crop_fields(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_images (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mapping_id INT,
  image_url TEXT,
  image_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (mapping_id) REFERENCES field_mapping(mapping_id)
);

CREATE TABLE soil_analysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  soil_type TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES crop_fields(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  field_id INT,
  data_date DATE,
  temperature FLOAT,
  humidity FLOAT,
  precipitation FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES crop_fields(field_id)
);
